item.description:
Come on out after work for some fun and volleyball!

Effin's is a great place and features an outside patio area, volley ball court, and an olympic size pool which is open till 9:00pm, so bring your suit if you'd like to take a swim too.

The volleyball court has been reserved for us for the evening. We'll have some beverages and then play some games. All are welcome to come and play or just hangout.

Bring a change of clothes as there is a band playing later that night. They also have a couple of pool tables and darts for those who wish to play.

Volleyball court is sand so please plan accordingly for footwear or no footwear. Games are for fun only, lets just am to get the ball over the net and get a volley going Â Losing team will have to jump in the pool before nights end...just kidding.
item.name: TGIF Happy Hour & Volley Ball
